rooms.name: Standard Twin Room
rooms.description:
2 single beds
Comfortable beds: 9 (based on 57 reviews)
Offering free toiletries, this twin room includes a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and slippers. The air-conditioned twin room offers a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar, a wardrobe, a safe deposit box as well as city views. The unit offers 2 beds
